class CodecManager

Detailed Description

Abstract audio decoder & renderer base class. The sub-classes of this class provide the actual audio decoder functionality API. The AudioDecoderRenderer sub-class instances are accessed by the clients via the CodecManager API.
See also:
CodecManager::ObtainDecoder

CodecManager::ReleaseDecoder

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef void(* AudioDecoderRenderer::CbReady)(void *context)
 

Callback function which is called when the audio decoder is ready to be fed with new input (encoded) data.

Parameters:
context A context (e.g. this pointer) that has been passed to the CodecDevice object when AudioDecoderRenderer::RegisterCallbackFunctions function has been invoked.
See also:
RegisterCallbackFunctions

Member Function Documentation

virtual void AudioDecoderRenderer::Close (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Closes and releases the audio decoder. This method should be invoked as soon as the audio decoder is not needed anymore to allow other audio decoders to access the resources.

See also:
Open

Implemented in AtiAudioDecoderRenderer.

virtual ResultType AudioDecoderRenderer::DecodeRenderBuffer (  AudioIOBuffer *  buffer  )  [pure virtual]
 

Decodes and renders an audio buffer. The input buffer shall contain at least one complete frame. When next input data are requested the callback function CbReady is called.

Parameters:
buffer Structure containing pointer to the audio input buffer (containing the encoded frames) amongst other required buffer information.
Returns:
Success if the operation was successful. Otherwise, an appropriate error code.
See also:
CbReady

RegisterCallbackFunctions

Implemented in AtiAudioDecoderRenderer.

virtual ResultType AudioDecoderRenderer::GetAudioChannelId (  AudioChannel &  audio_channel  )  [pure virtual]
 

This function retrieves the current audio channel ID.

Parameters:
audio_channel On return, the audio channel ID.

Implemented in AtiAudioDecoderRenderer.

virtual ResultType AudioDecoderRenderer::Open (  AudioChannel &  audio_channel  )  [pure virtual]
 

Opens the audio decoder. In general, when a decoder is opened, it is reserved for the caller and cannot be used by another caller. Thus, as soon as the audio decoder is not needed anymore, it shall be released by using Close.

Parameters:
audio_channel On return, the audio channel ID.
Returns:
Success if the operation was successful. Otherwise, an appropriate error code.
See also:
Close

Implemented in AtiAudioDecoderRenderer.

virtual ResultType AudioDecoderRenderer::RegisterCallbackFunctions (  void *  context,
CbReady  cb_ready_for_data,
CbResult  cb_all_buffers_processed
)  [pure virtual]
 

Register callback functions.

Parameters:
context A context (e.g. this pointer) that is valid for all callback functions registered with this instance of the AudioDecoderRenderer. This context is then passed as an argument of all callback functions invoked by the AudioDecoderRenderer.
cb_ready_for_data A pointer to a callback function that is invoked by the AudioDecoderRenderer when a frame has been decoded (and post-processed) and is ready for rendering.
Returns:
Success if the operation was successful. Otherwise, an appropriate error code.
See also:
CbReady

CodecDevice::CbResult
